name: Destructive Reach
description: Devastate an enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing 1161 Magic Damage and an additional 2315 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  The initial hit always applies the element's status effect.
effectLines: Increases the range.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
coefDescription: Devastate an enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing $1 Magic Damage and an additional $2 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  The initial hit always applies the element's status effect.
rawDescription:
Devastate an enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing <<1>> and an additional <<2>> Magic Damage over <<3>>.

The initial hit always applies the element's status effect.
